name: The Boy On The First Floor
name_original: The Boy On The First Floor
description:
A Ludum Dare Jam game made by me, Znurre and Xinux.

Description
This game started out as a perhaps somewhat over ambitious game idea, where we wanted to create a dungeon crawler of sorts, where you would go deeper and deeper into a dungeon made up of small, but memorable floors. We ended up incorporating the theme by having the dungeon loop. Once you reach the last floor, you will loop back to the first floor, but with a twist! Can you manage to break the loop?

Controls
Walk on W/A/S/D or arrow keys
Attach and interact on space
